nodes.description: 1983年12月12日，针对科威特美国使馆、法国使馆、主要机场和石油化工厂的同步爆炸事件，造成6人死亡
nodes.support_text: On 12 December 1983, a truck laden with 45 large cylinders of gas connected to plastic explosives broke through the front gates of the American Embassy in Kuwait City and rammed into the embassy's three-story administrative annex, demolishing half the structure.

nodes.description: 爆炸后伊斯兰抵抗组织（Islamic Jihad）声称负责，并威胁科威特释放17名囚犯
nodes.support_text: Islamic Jihad called Kuwaiti authorities to take responsibility for the blast.

nodes.description: 1984年12月3日，黎巴嫩真主党劫持科威特航空221航班，要求释放17名囚犯
nodes.support_text: On 3 December 1984, a Kuwait Airways flight from Kuwait City to Karachi, Pakistan was hijacked by four Lebanese Shi'a hijackers and diverted to Tehran.

nodes.description: 1985年6月14日，真主党劫持美国联合航空847航班，继续要求释放囚犯
nodes.support_text: In 1985, Hezbollah kidnapped American hostage Frank Regier and Frenchman Christian Joubert.

nodes.description: 1988年4月5日，真主党劫持科威特航空422航班，迫使飞机降落在伊朗
nodes.support_text: On 5 April 1988, Hezbollah hijacked Kuwait Airways Flight 422.

nodes.description: 1985年5月25日，伊斯兰抵抗组织策划刺杀科威特埃米尔，导致2人死亡
nodes.support_text: Analysts say,... there is little doubt Mugniyeh and Al Din helped plan December 1983 bombings in Kuwait against the U.S. and French embassies there....

nodes.description: 1990年伊拉克入侵科威特期间，17名囚犯从监狱逃脱
nodes.support_text: After the 1990 Iraqi invasion, 17 defendants (including 12 from Islamic Dawa) escaped from prison.

nodes.description: 2007年2月，科威特法院对策划爆炸的Jamal Jafaar Mohammed判处死刑
nodes.support_text: In February 2007, Kuwaiti court sentenced Jamal Jafaar Mohammed to death.

nodes.description: 1983年12月12日，针对科威特美国使馆、法国使馆、主要机场和石油化工厂的同步爆炸事件，造成6人死亡
袭击者被传与伊朗关联
nodes.support_text: The perpetrators of the bombing are unknown but were purported to be connected to the Islamic Republic of Iran.

nodes.support_text: 黎巴嫩海军基地遭轰炸

nodes.description: 真主党轰炸美国大使馆
nodes.support_text: 真主党轰炸美国大使馆

nodes.description: 真主党被怀疑为策划者
nodes.support_text: 真主党被怀疑为策划者

nodes.description: 科威特政府被意外袭击
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：科威特政府被袭击完全意外
语义描述：政府逮捕外国工人
语义描述：政府设置路障
语义描述：政府实施身份检查

nodes.description: 士兵命令射击拒绝配合者
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：士兵命令射击拒绝配合者

edges.support_text: The perpetrators of the bombing are unknown but were purported to be connected to the Islamic Republic of Iran.

On 27 March 1984, following the conviction of the al-Da'wa defendants, the hostage takers threatened to kill their hostages if the Kuwaiti government carried through with the planned execution of the al-Dawa prisoners.
In 1985, Hezbollah kidnapped American hostage Frank Regier and Frenchman Christian Joubert.
On 5 April 1988, Hezbollah hijacked Kuwait Airways Flight 422.
After the 1990 Iraqi invasion, 17 defendants (including 12 from Islamic Dawa) escaped from prison.
Analysts say,... there is little doubt Mugniyeh and Al Din helped plan December 1983 bombings in Kuwait against the U.S. and French embassies there....
In February 2007, Kuwaiti court sentenced Jamal Jafaar Mohammed to death.
事件发生前存在关联性推测
